name: Zombie Shooting Game
description: I'm developing this game in the Clickteam fusion program that I do not know to use right, much less I know how to program so I use this program, but I do not expect this game that I'm producing turns out to be fucking  because it sucks and will always be, maybe I keep giving updates on it but it will be adding a mechanic, more zombies and other things that I have been learning over time.
